UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_COMMON_AREA_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_ITEM_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_COMMON_AREA_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_MAINT_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_COMMON_AREA_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_ITEM_MAP A WHERE NUM_COMMON_AREA_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_MAINT_MAP A WHERE NUM_COMMON_AREA_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.GNUM_SLNO=? and T.NUM_COMMON_AREA_ID=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
